page.description: Returns TRUE if we are on the first record of the specified (or current) search order.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.BOF() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.BOF( [ Index_Tagname as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Index_TagnameOptional. Default = Record number order. The name of an index.
Description The &ltTBL>.BOF() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the current record is the first record in the logical order specified by Index_Tagname. Example This calculated field on a form returns True if the current record is the first record in lastname index order. table.current().bof("lastname")
See Also Table Functions and Methods, <TBL>.EOF()
